plays.text: Penalty to Owen Nolan 2 minutes for Elbowing Kelly Buchberger

Penalty to MIIKKA KIPRUSOFF 2 minutes for Delay of Game(opposing player not identified) served by Scott Hannan
Penalty to Stephane Matteau 2 minutes for Hooking Zigmund Palffy
Penalty to Zigmund Palffy 2 minutes for Diving Stephane Matteau
